definition: practice (customary action, as opposed to theory)/practical
affair/business/matter/to be engaged in/to attend to/by all means

sentences.english: I graduated from Guilin Institute, majoring in the professional practice of international trade.
sentences.chinese: 我畢業於桂林山水學院，主修的是國際貿易實務專業。

sentences.english: Author major make substantive research damages from the point of view of the scope of compensation.
sentences.chinese: 筆者主要從損害賠償範圍的角度進行實務性研究。

sentences.english: And they improve practices in global markets.
sentences.chinese: 他們還有助於改進全球市場的實務。

sentences.english: This course is an introduction to basic metal-cutting principles and their practical applications.
sentences.chinese: 本課程介紹基本的金屬切削原理及其實務應用。

sentences.english: The degree provides the academic and practical experience to practise as a radiographer.
sentences.chinese: 該學位提供技師的學術及實務執業經驗。

sentences.english: In practice, such "cross-selling" is hard to pull off.
sentences.chinese: 實務上，這種”交叉銷售”不容易成功。

sentences.english: This course examines and employs a more practical approach to analyze XML problems.
sentences.chinese: 本研究將使用較爲實務性的角度來分析XML的問題。

sentences.english: However, such provisions are of evidentiary value insofar as they bear upon questions of custom and practice.
sentences.chinese: 但是，此條款具有習慣與實務上無上的價值。

sentences.english: The full-featured version of the code has additional capabilities that are not available on the Web.
sentences.chinese: 全版的內容，實務能力也沒有提供額外的網站。

sentences.english: Philosophy is an aspect of metaphysics; while management, by contrast is a practical matter.
sentences.chinese: 哲學是屬形上之學，管理則以形而下的實務加以體現。

sentences.english: Based on the research finings, several suggestions were made to practitioners.
sentences.chinese: 本研究最後提出對企業實務上建議。

sentences.english: To familiarize students with further conception of Statistics. 2. To familiarize students with application of Statistic theory and practice.
sentences.chinese: 培養學生瞭解統計分析實務在資管領域之應用與分析。

sentences.english: Extraction of confession by torture has been one of the persistent ailments in legal affairs.
sentences.chinese: 刑訊逼供一直以來是司法實務中的頑症之一。

sentences.english: There has been different viewpoint about enforcing the institution of lawyers fee payment by transmission.
sentences.chinese: 理論界和實務界對於實施律師費轉付制有不同的觀點。

sentences.english: Lifeguards have to undertake extensive1 classroom and hands-on training.
sentences.chinese: 救生員必須通過密集的課堂及實務訓練。

sentences.english: Finally, some mechatronic systems developed for the vehicles will be introduced as the design examples.
sentences.chinese: 最後以各種車輛機電整合系統爲實務介紹。

definition: to give guidance/to mentor/to counsel/to coach/to tutor
to teach/teaching and learning/education/CL:門|门[men2],個|个[ge4]
to work in a profession (e.g. doctor, lawyer)/practitioner/professional
to put to use/to apply/practical/applied (science, linguistics etc)/application/practical use/(computing) app
practice/to put into practice/to live up to (a promise)/to carry out (a project)
